hero.title: Your dreams are not just wishful thinking.
hero.subtitle1: TripNARA helps you turn "I want to go" into a travel route you can truly complete.
hero.subtitle2: From route direction and risk assessment to executable schedules, we ensure plans are not only beautiful, but realistic and reliable.
hero.microCopy2: Dreams can be calculated into executable plans.

card1.title: First judge: Should this route exist?
card1.description: Instead of stuffing more attractions into the schedule, we first confirm whether the direction is reasonable, reachable, and executable.

card2.title: Completable each day, not just a list of points
card2.description: TripNARA generates executable schedule structures based on travel duration, stops, rhythm, and buffer.

card3.title: If circumstances change, it won't fall apart
card3.description: Closed? Weather? Insufficient energy? The system automatically generates optimal replacement solutions.

problem.title:
Most travel tools recommend more places.
We first ask whether the route itself makes sense.
problem.tripnaraRouteDesc: Coherent linear structure with route intelligence

routeDirection.title: RouteDirection
routeDirection.description:
A country is not a list of places.
It is a way the land wants to be walked.

decisionComparison.description1: We don't start with "recommending more places." We start with a more fundamental question:
decisionComparison.question: Should this route exist at all?

demTopography.title: Terrain is the truth layer of travel planning
demTopography.description: TripNARA uses terrain as the truth layer. Slope, cumulative ascent, walking difficulty ‚Äî no longer based on feeling.

professionalUsers.title: TripNARA is Also Used by These People

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Will TripNARA decide everything for me?
faq.answer1: No. We'll give you "suggestions + evidence + alternatives."

finalCTA.title: Turn dreams into routes you can truly complete

closing.title:
We don't optimize trips.
We help you avoid a decision you shouldn't make.

product.title: TripNARA is a Route & Decision System

hero.subtitle: We don't recommend more places. Instead, we help you judge whether a route should exist and transform it into a truly executable travel plan.

module2.title: Executable Schedule Generation
module2.description: Transform routes into daily executable structures

workflow.title: Workflow
workflow.step1: First judge whether the route should exist

firstPrinciples.title: First Principles
firstPrinciples.question: We begin with one question:
firstPrinciples.answer: Should this route exist ‚Äî now, for you, under these conditions?

voice.title: Brand Voice & Tone Guide
voice.subtitle: TripNARA's Voice = Calm, Respectful of Reality, But Always on Humanity's Side

risk.title: When Risks Appear
risk.text: This route has significantly higher risk than average under current conditions. We recommend choosing a safer alternative.

rejection.title: When We Need to Refuse
rejection.text: For safety reasons, we cannot recommend this route. This is how we take responsibility for travel.

success.title: When Journey Succeeds
success.text: What truly makes the journey successful is your choices and commitment. We are just your partner.

journey.title: Real User Journey Map
journey.subtitle: Your product journey is already very clear

discovery.title: Discovery Stage
discovery.description: User wants to travel but feels uncertain, doesn't want cookie-cutter trips, wants to "take it seriously" ‚Üí Enters TripNARA

understanding.title: Understanding Stage
understanding.description: They discover: Oh, this isn't a travel app, this is‚Äîa Route Responsibility System. Trust + Relief

routeDirection.title: RouteDirection Selection
routeDirection.description: System provides: Optimal direction, explanation, risk warnings ‚Üí Rational + Human

planning.title: Route Building
planning.description: User participates, not just consumes. TripNARA is like a partner, not a "tour guide"

preparation.title: Execution Preparation
preparation.description: Risk coverage, budget monitoring, pace balance, backup plans ‚Üí Psychological security ‚Üë‚Üë‚Üë

review.title: Review
review.description: Journey is understood, value is preserved

manifesto.title: Brand Manifesto
manifesto.line1: TripNARA doesn't sell travel; we take seriously "how routes should be walked"
manifesto.line2: We believe travel is not escaping reality, but facing the world in a more dignified and mature way
manifesto.line3: We only recommend routes that are feasible
manifesto.commitment: This is our promise to the world

stories.title: Real Travel, Real Decisions
stories.subtitle: See how TripNARA accompanies different travelers, turning dreams into executable routes.

about.title: We care not about 'going to more places', but whether you truly complete a journey.

mission.title: Mission
mission.text: Make travel a better decision-making process

recruiting.title: Recruiting
